# BoldKit - Neubrutalism UI Component Library for React & Vue 3

> BoldKit is a free, open-source component library featuring neubrutalism design aesthetics. Built on shadcn/ui with Radix UI (React) and Reka UI (Vue) primitives and Tailwind CSS v4.

## Quick Facts

- **Components:** 50+ UI components
- **Blocks:** 15 section blocks (10 marketing + 5 application)
- **Templates:** 6 full-page templates
- **Charts:** 10 chart types (Bar, Line, Area, Pie, Donut, Radar, Radial, Gauge, Sparkline)
- **Shapes:** 42 SVG decorative shapes
- **License:** MIT (free for commercial use)
- **Frameworks:** React 19 & Vue 3
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS v4
- **TypeScript:** Full type support
- **Accessibility:** Built on Radix UI (React) & Reka UI (Vue) primitives

## Installation

### React (shadcn CLI)

```bash
# Install any component
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/button.json

# Install shapes (42 SVG shapes)
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/shapes.json

# Install theme
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/theme.json
```

### Vue 3 (shadcn-vue CLI)

```bash
# Install any component
npx shadcn-vue@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/vue/button.json

# Install shapes
npx shadcn-vue@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/vue/shapes.json

# Install theme
npx shadcn-vue@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/vue/theme.json
```

### All Available Components

```bash
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/accordion.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/alert.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/alert-dialog.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/aspect-ratio.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/avatar.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/badge.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/breadcrumb.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/button.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/calendar.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/card.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/chart.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/checkbox.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/collapsible.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/command.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/dialog.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/drawer.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/dropdown-menu.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/hover-card.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/input.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/input-otp.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/label.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/layered-card.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/marquee.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/pagination.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/popover.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/progress.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/radio-group.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/scroll-area.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/select.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/separator.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/shapes.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/sheet.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/skeleton.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/slider.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/sonner.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/sticker.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/switch.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/table.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/tabs.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/textarea.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/toggle.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/toggle-group.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/tooltip.json

# NEW v2.5.0 Components
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/spinner.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/kbd.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/stepper.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/dropzone.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/stat-card.json

# NEW v2.5.0 Charts
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/sparkline.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/donut-chart.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/radar-chart.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/radial-bar-chart.json
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/gauge-chart.json

# NEW v2.6.0 Components
npx shadcn@latest add https://boldkit.dev/r/empty-state.json
```

## Documentation URLs

- Homepage: https://boldkit.dev
- Documentation: https://boldkit.dev/docs
- Installation: https://boldkit.dev/docs/installation
- Components: https://boldkit.dev/components
- Blocks: https://boldkit.dev/blocks
- Templates: https://boldkit.dev/templates
- Shapes: https://boldkit.dev/shapes
- Charts: https://boldkit.dev/charts
- Theme Builder: https://boldkit.dev/themes
- GitHub: https://github.com/ANIBIT14/boldkit
- Registry: https://boldkit.dev/registry.json

## Code Examples

### Button Component

```tsx
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'

// Variants: default, secondary, accent, destructive, outline, ghost, link
<Button variant="default">Primary Button</Button>
<Button variant="secondary">Secondary</Button>
<Button variant="accent">Accent</Button>
<Button variant="destructive">Destructive</Button>
<Button variant="outline">Outline</Button>
<Button variant="ghost">Ghost</Button>

// Sizes: default, sm, lg, xl, icon
<Button size="sm">Small</Button>
<Button size="lg">Large</Button>
<Button size="icon"><Icon /></Button>
```

### Card Component

```tsx
import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardContent, CardFooter } from '@/components/ui/card'

<Card>
  <CardHeader>
    <CardTitle>Card Title</CardTitle>
    <CardDescription>Card description text</CardDescription>
  </CardHeader>
  <CardContent>
    <p>Card content goes here</p>
  </CardContent>
  <CardFooter>
    <Button>Action</Button>
  </CardFooter>
</Card>
```

### Input Component

```tsx
import { Input } from '@/components/ui/input'
import { Label } from '@/components/ui/label'

<div className="space-y-2">
  <Label htmlFor="email">Email</Label>
  <Input id="email" type="email" placeholder="Enter email" />
</div>
```

### Dialog Component

```tsx
import { Dialog, DialogTrigger, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogTitle, DialogDescription } from '@/components/ui/dialog'

<Dialog>
  <DialogTrigger asChild>
    <Button>Open Dialog</Button>
  </DialogTrigger>
  <DialogContent>
    <DialogHeader>
      <DialogTitle>Dialog Title</DialogTitle>
      <DialogDescription>Dialog description</DialogDescription>
    </DialogHeader>
    <p>Dialog content</p>
  </DialogContent>
</Dialog>
```

### Shapes Component

```tsx
import { BurstShape, HeartShape, LightningShape, Star5Shape } from '@/components/ui/shapes'

// Basic usage
<BurstShape size={100} />

// Custom color (uses Tailwind text color)
<HeartShape size={80} className="text-destructive" />

// Outline only (not filled)
<LightningShape size={60} filled={false} />

// Custom stroke width
<Star5Shape size={100} strokeWidth={5} />

// All 42 shapes available:
// BurstShape, BlobShape, ArrowBadge, ZigzagBanner, ScribbleCircle,
// TicketShape, SplatShape, SpeechBubble, DiamondBadge, HexagonShape,
// CrossShape, LightningShape, HeartShape, Star4Shape, ShieldShape,
// RibbonShape, WaveShape, OctagonShape, CloudShape, TagShape,
// Star5Shape, Star6Shape, PentagonShape, TrapezoidShape, ParallelogramShape,
// CursorShape, BookmarkShape, FlagShape, PillShape, EyeShape, TriangleShape,
// SunShape, CrescentShape, RainbowShape, PlanetShape, UmbrellaShape, AppleShape,
// PriceTagShape, CouponShape, ScribbleUnderline, PaperTearShape, ExplosionShape
```

### Layered Card (Stacked Paper Effect)

```tsx
import { LayeredCard, LayeredCardHeader, LayeredCardTitle, LayeredCardContent } from '@/components/ui/layered-card'

<LayeredCard layers="double" offset="default" layerColor="primary">
  <LayeredCardHeader>
    <LayeredCardTitle>Stacked Card</LayeredCardTitle>
  </LayeredCardHeader>
  <LayeredCardContent>
    <p>Creates a stacked paper depth effect</p>
  </LayeredCardContent>
</LayeredCard>

// Props:
// layers: "single" | "double" | "triple"
// offset: "sm" | "default" | "lg"
// layerColor: "default" | "primary" | "secondary" | "accent" | "muted"
```

### Marquee (Scrolling Ticker)

```tsx
import { Marquee } from '@/components/ui/marquee'

<Marquee speed="normal" pauseOnHover>
  <span>Scrolling text content</span>
  <span>More content</span>
</Marquee>

// Props:
// speed: "slow" | "normal" | "fast"
// direction: "left" | "right"
// pauseOnHover: boolean
```

### Sticker Component

```tsx
import { Sticker } from '@/components/ui/sticker'

<Sticker variant="default" rotation="left">
  New Feature!
</Sticker>

// Props:
// variant: "default" | "accent" | "destructive" | "success"
// rotation: "left" | "right" | "none"
```

### Chart Component

```tsx
import { ChartContainer, ChartTooltip, ChartTooltipContent, CHART_PALETTES, getChartColor } from '@/components/ui/chart'
import { Bar, BarChart, XAxis, YAxis } from 'recharts'

// Container variants: default, elevated, flat, filled, minimal, accent, primary
<ChartContainer config={chartConfig} variant="elevated">
  <BarChart data={data}>
    <Bar dataKey="value" fill={getChartColor('vibrant', 0)} />
  </BarChart>
</ChartContainer>

// Color palettes: bold, vibrant, pastel, monochrome
// Use getChartColor(palette, index) for consistent colors
const color = getChartColor('vibrant', 0) // 'hsl(0 84% 60%)'

// Available palettes:
// CHART_PALETTES.bold - Uses CSS variables (primary, secondary, accent, etc.)
// CHART_PALETTES.vibrant - Bright coral, teal, yellow, purple, green, blue
// CHART_PALETTES.pastel - Lighter versions of vibrant colors
// CHART_PALETTES.monochrome - Foreground color with opacity variations
```

### Spinner Component (NEW v2.5.0)

```tsx
import { Spinner } from '@/components/ui/spinner'

// Variants: default, dots, bars, blocks, brutal
<Spinner variant="default" />
<Spinner variant="dots" />
<Spinner variant="bars" />
<Spinner variant="blocks" />
<Spinner variant="brutal" />

// Sizes: xs, sm, md, lg, xl
<Spinner size="xs" />
<Spinner size="lg" />
```

### Kbd Component (NEW v2.5.0)

```tsx
import { Kbd, KbdCombo } from '@/components/ui/kbd'

// Single key
<Kbd>⌘</Kbd>
<Kbd>Shift</Kbd>

// Key combination
<KbdCombo keys={['⌘', 'K']} />
<KbdCombo keys={['Ctrl', 'Shift', 'P']} />

// Variants: default, outline, ghost
// Sizes: sm, md, lg
<Kbd variant="outline" size="lg">Enter</Kbd>
```

### Stepper Component (NEW v2.5.0)

```tsx
import { Stepper, StepperList, StepperItem, StepperTrigger, StepperContent, StepperSeparator } from '@/components/ui/stepper'

<Stepper defaultValue={1}>
  <StepperList>
    <StepperItem value={1}>
      <StepperTrigger>Step 1</StepperTrigger>
    </StepperItem>
    <StepperSeparator />
    <StepperItem value={2}>
      <StepperTrigger>Step 2</StepperTrigger>
    </StepperItem>
  </StepperList>
  <StepperContent value={1}>Step 1 content</StepperContent>
  <StepperContent value={2}>Step 2 content</StepperContent>
</Stepper>

// Orientation: horizontal, vertical
// Sizes: sm, md, lg
```

### Dropzone Component (NEW v2.5.0)

```tsx
import { Dropzone, FileList } from '@/components/ui/dropzone'

<Dropzone
  onFilesAccepted={(files) => console.log(files)}
  onFilesRejected={(rejections) => console.log(rejections)}
  accept={{ 'image/*': ['.png', '.jpg', '.jpeg'] }}
  maxSize={5 * 1024 * 1024} // 5MB
  maxFiles={5}
>
  {/* Custom content or use default */}
</Dropzone>

// Variants: default, compact, minimal
// With file list:
<FileList
  files={uploadedFiles}
  onRemove={(file) => handleRemove(file)}
/>
```

### StatCard Component (NEW v2.5.0)

```tsx
import { StatCard } from '@/components/ui/stat-card'

<StatCard
  title="Total Revenue"
  value="$45,231"
  change="+20.1%"
  trend="up"
  icon={<DollarSign />}
  color="success"
/>

// Props:
// trend: "up" | "down"
// color: "primary" | "secondary" | "accent" | "success" | "warning" | "info" | "destructive"
// variant: "default" | "compact" | "large"
```

### Gauge Chart (NEW v2.5.0)

```tsx
import { GaugeChart } from '@/components/ui/chart'

<GaugeChart
  value={75}
  min={0}
  max={100}
  label="Performance"
  zones={[
    { from: 0, to: 33, color: 'hsl(var(--destructive))', label: 'Low' },
    { from: 33, to: 66, color: 'hsl(var(--warning))', label: 'Medium' },
    { from: 66, to: 100, color: 'hsl(var(--success))', label: 'High' },
  ]}
/>

// Sizes: sm, md, lg
// Shows animated needle, zones, and value display
```

### Sparkline (NEW v2.5.0)

```tsx
import { Sparkline } from '@/components/ui/chart'

<Sparkline
  data={[10, 25, 15, 30, 20, 45, 35]}
  type="line"
  color="hsl(var(--primary))"
  height={32}
  showEndDot
/>

// Types: line, area, bar
// Great for inline trend visualization in tables or stat cards
```

### Donut Chart (NEW v2.5.0)

```tsx
import { DonutChart, DonutChartCenter } from '@/components/ui/chart'

<DonutChart
  data={chartData}
  config={chartConfig}
  innerRadius="60%"
  outerRadius="80%"
>
  <DonutChartCenter>
    <div className="text-2xl font-bold">$12.5K</div>
    <div className="text-sm text-muted-foreground">Total</div>
  </DonutChartCenter>
</DonutChart>

// Variants: default, separated (with gaps between segments)
```

### Radar Chart (NEW v2.5.0)

```tsx
import { RadarChart } from '@/components/ui/chart'

<RadarChart
  data={skillsData}
  dataKeys={['current', 'target']}
  config={chartConfig}
  showLegend
/>

// Great for multi-variable comparison (skills, metrics, etc.)
```

### Radial Bar Chart (NEW v2.5.0)

```tsx
import { RadialBarChart } from '@/components/ui/chart'

<RadialBarChart
  data={progressData}
  config={chartConfig}
  showLabel
  showBackground
/>

// Variants: default, stacked, nested
// Shows circular progress bars
```

### Empty State Component (NEW v2.6.0)

```tsx
import {
  EmptyState,
  EmptyStateIcon,
  EmptyStateTitle,
  EmptyStateDescription,
  EmptyStateActions,
  EmptyStatePreset,
} from '@/components/ui/empty-state'
import { Inbox, Plus } from 'lucide-react'

// Composable API
<EmptyState>
  <EmptyStateIcon>
    <Inbox className="h-10 w-10" />
  </EmptyStateIcon>
  <EmptyStateTitle>No messages</EmptyStateTitle>
  <EmptyStateDescription>Your inbox is empty</EmptyStateDescription>
  <EmptyStateActions>
    <Button><Plus className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />Compose</Button>
  </EmptyStateActions>
</EmptyState>

// Preset API for common scenarios
<EmptyStatePreset
  preset="no-results"
  action={<Button>Clear search</Button>}
/>

// Available presets:
// 'no-results', 'no-data', 'empty-inbox', 'empty-folder',
// 'no-users', 'empty-cart', 'no-notifications', 'no-images'

// Variants: default, filled, card
// Sizes: sm, md, lg
// Icon colors: default, primary, secondary, accent, muted
```

## Design Tokens (CSS Variables)

### Colors (HSL Format)

```css
/* Light Theme */
--primary: 0 84% 71%;           /* Coral */
--secondary: 174 62% 56%;       /* Teal */
--accent: 49 100% 71%;          /* Yellow */
--destructive: 0 84% 60%;       /* Red */
--success: 152 69% 69%;         /* Green */
--warning: 49 100% 60%;         /* Orange */
--info: 212 100% 73%;           /* Blue */

/* Neubrutalism Specific */
--shadow-color: 240 10% 10%;    /* Shadow color */
--border: 240 10% 10%;          /* Border color */
```

### Neubrutalism CSS Utilities

```css
/* Thick borders */
.border-3 { border-width: 3px; }

/* Hard shadow (no blur) */
.bk-shadow { box-shadow: 4px 4px 0px hsl(var(--shadow-color)); }

/* Press-down hover effect */
.bk-hover:hover {
  transform: translate(4px, 4px);
  box-shadow: none;
}
```

## Component Categories

### Layout & Containers
- Card, Layered Card, StatCard (NEW), Dialog, Drawer, Sheet, Accordion, Collapsible, Tabs, Stepper (NEW), Scroll Area

### Form Controls
- Button, Input, Textarea, Checkbox, Radio Group, Select, Switch, Slider, Input OTP, Label, Dropzone (NEW)

### Feedback & Status
- Alert, Alert Dialog, Badge, Progress, Skeleton, Spinner (NEW), Sonner (Toast)

### Navigation
- Breadcrumb, Dropdown Menu, Pagination, Command (Command Palette)

### Data Display
- Avatar, Table, Hover Card, Tooltip, Calendar, Kbd (NEW)

### Charts (10 Types)
- Area Chart, Bar Chart, Line Chart, Pie Chart
- Donut Chart (NEW), Radar Chart (NEW), Radial Bar Chart (NEW), Gauge Chart (NEW), Sparkline (NEW)

### Decorative (Neubrutalism Special)
- Sticker, Stamp, StickyNote, Marquee, 42 SVG Shapes

## Tech Stack

### React
- React 19
- Radix UI Primitives (accessibility)
- Recharts (data visualization)

### Vue 3
- Vue 3 with Composition API
- Reka UI Primitives (Radix port for Vue)
- vue-echarts (data visualization)

### Shared
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS v4
- Class Variance Authority (variants)
- Vite (build tool)

## Registry API

Component JSON files are available at:
- Index: `https://boldkit.dev/registry.json`
- Components: `https://boldkit.dev/r/{component-name}.json`

Example: `https://boldkit.dev/r/button.json`

## Section Blocks (NEW v2.6.0)

### Marketing Blocks (10)
- Hero Section: Centered, Split, WithStats, Minimal, WithVideo
- Feature Grid: WithIcons, WithImages, Alternating, Bento
- Testimonials: Grid, Single, Masonry, WithAvatars
- Logo Cloud: Grid, Marquee, Cards, WithStats
- CTA Section: Simple, WithBackground, Newsletter, Split, Banner
- Stats Section: Grid, Cards, Split, Inline, WithIcons
- Team Section: Grid, List, LargePhotos, Compact
- FAQ Section: Accordion, TwoColumns, WithCategories, WithContact, SimpleList
- Footer Section: MultiColumn, WithNewsletter, Simple, Minimal, WithCTA
- Contact Section: Split, Centered, WithCards, WithMap

### Application Blocks (5)
- Auth Forms: Login, SignUp, ForgotPassword, OTPVerification, SplitLayout
- Settings Page: Profile, Notifications, Security, Appearance, DangerZone, FullPage
- Onboarding Flow: Wizard, Welcome, ProfileSetup, WorkspaceSetup, GoalSelection, Completion
- Error Pages: NotFound (404), ServerError (500), Maintenance, Offline, Forbidden (403), ComingSoon, Generic
- Invoice: Full, Receipt, Summary, List

### Blocks Usage

```tsx
// Marketing Block
import { HeroSection } from '@/components/blocks/marketing'

<HeroSection.Centered
  title="Welcome"
  description="Your description here"
  primaryAction={{ label: 'Get Started', href: '/signup' }}
/>

// Application Block
import { AuthForms } from '@/components/blocks/application'

<AuthForms.Login
  onSubmit={(data) => console.log(data)}
  socialProviders={['google', 'github']}
/>
```

## Full-Page Templates (6)

1. **Landing Page** - SaaS landing with hero, features, pricing, testimonials
2. **Portfolio** - Personal portfolio with hero, services, projects, contact
3. **Dashboard** - Admin panel with sidebar, stats, charts, data tables
4. **Pricing** - 3-tier pricing with comparison table and FAQ
5. **Blog** - Magazine-style blog with featured articles and newsletter
6. **Product** - E-commerce product page with gallery, reviews, related items

### Template URLs
- Landing: https://boldkit.dev/templates/landing-page
- Portfolio: https://boldkit.dev/templates/portfolio
- Dashboard: https://boldkit.dev/templates/dashboard
- Pricing: https://boldkit.dev/templates/pricing
- Blog: https://boldkit.dev/templates/blog
- Product: https://boldkit.dev/templates/product

- Full Sitemap: `https://boldkit.dev/sitemap.xml`
- Main Pages: `https://boldkit.dev/`, `https://boldkit.dev/docs`, `https://boldkit.dev/components`, `https://boldkit.dev/blocks`
- Templates: `https://boldkit.dev/templates`, `https://boldkit.dev/templates/landing-page`, `https://boldkit.dev/templates/portfolio`, `https://boldkit.dev/templates/dashboard`, `https://boldkit.dev/templates/pricing`, `https://boldkit.dev/templates/blog`, `https://boldkit.dev/templates/product`
- Marketing Blocks: `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/hero-section`, `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/feature-grid`, `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/testimonials`, `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/logo-cloud`, `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/cta-section`, `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/stats-section`, `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/team-section`, `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/faq-section`, `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/footer-section`, `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/contact-section`
- Application Blocks: `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/auth-forms`, `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/settings-page`, `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/onboarding-flow`, `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/error-pages`, `https://boldkit.dev/blocks/invoice`
